responses: Ingredients of Daab Chingri: Shrimps, deshelled and deveined, 1 large daab (tender coconut), 1 small onion, 2 cloves of garlic, 1/2 tsp green chilli paste, 2 Tbsp mustard paste, 1/4 tsp panch phoron, 3 Tbsp mustard oil, Salt, Turmeric powder, Wheat dough/aluminium foil (to seal the coconut)

patterns: Which oil is used for cooking bengali food?
Oil used for cooking food
Which oil can I use for cooking bengali food
Name a oil that can be used to make bengali food
Recommend the best oil that can be used to make bengali food
responses: Mustard oil is a favourite in the State of West Bengal because of its sharp and pungent flavour. It adds horseradish like kick to vegetables and curries, which goes well with rice, a staple food of Bengalis.
